msg.atlasviewer.export_atlas_success: Atlas successfully exported. Click the link below to open the folder containing the exported image.
msg.atlasviewer.export_atlas_error: Encountered an error while exporting the atlas. An excerpt of the error is shown below. See the game log for more info.
msg.atlasviewer.export_sprite_success: Sprite successfully exported. Click the link below to open the folder containing the exported image.
msg.atlasviewer.export_sprite_error: Encountered an error while exporting the sprite. An excerpt of the error is shown below. See the game log for more info.
